10870Journal of Chemical CrystallographyJ Chem Crystallogr1074-15421572-8854Kluwer Academic Publishers-Plenum PublishersNew YorkArt12BF0166831210.1007/BF01668312ArticleCrystal structure of aquo (hydroxo) (ethylenediaminetetraacetato) sodium(I) tin(IV), NaSn(OH)(edta)(H2O)Brouca-CabarrecqChantal1MarrotBertrand1MossetAlain1grid.462730.40000000092547345Centre d'Elaboration de Matériaux et d'Etudes Structurales du CNRS29 rue Jeanne Marvig31055ToulouseFrance7199626750350826420052821996© Plenum Publishing Corporation 19961996Abstract

NaSn(OH)(edta)(H2O) is monoclinic, space groupP21/c, witha=9.747(3)Å,b=9.121(3)Å,c=16.430(6)Å, β=98.69(4)°, Å3, andZ=4. The coordination environment of Sn(IV) is a capped octahedron. Sn−O distances range from 1.990(6)Å to 2.351(7)Å. Na(I) is five coordinated to three different edta molecules. Na−O distances range from 2.283(9)Å to 2.414(7)Å. The edta ligand presents the E, G/R conformation. The crystal structure is composed of sheets parallel to (001): inside a sheet Sn(OH)(edta) molecules are connected to each other by the Na(I) interactions.

elements.content: NaSn(OH)(edta)(H2O) is monoclinic, space groupP21/c, witha=9.747(3)Å,b=9.121(3)Å,c=16.430(6)Å, β=98.69(4)°, Å3, andZ=4. The coordination environment of Sn(IV) is a capped octahedron. Sn−O distances range from 1.990(6)Å to 2.351(7)Å. Na(I) is five coordinated to three different edta molecules. Na−O distances range from 2.283(9)Å to 2.414(7)Å. The edta ligand presents the E, G/R conformation. The crystal structure is composed of sheets parallel to (001): inside a sheet Sn(OH)(edta) molecules are connected to each other by the Na(I) interactions.
elements.clean_text:
Abstract

NaSn(OH)(edta)(H2O) is monoclinic, space groupP21/c, witha=9.747(3)Å,b=9.121(3)Å,c=16.430(6)Å, β=98.69(4)°, Å3, andZ=4. The coordination environment of Sn(IV) is a capped octahedron. Sn-O distances range from 1.990(6)Å to 2.351(7)Å. Na(I) is five coordinated to three different edta molecules. Na-O distances range from 2.283(9)Å to 2.414(7)Å. The edta ligand presents the E, G/R conformation. The crystal structure is composed of sheets parallel to (001): inside a sheet Sn(OH)(edta) molecules are connected to each other by the Na(I) interactions.
